mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_location_address (member_id, title, road_address, parcel_address, lat, lon, nx, ny) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{roadAddress}, #{parcelAddress}, #{lat}, #{lon}, #{nx}, #{ny})
mapper.select: SELECT id AS addressId, member_id, title, road_address, parcel_address, lat, lon, nx, ny FROM member_location_address WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND is_selected = TRUE LIMIT 1
